title: More female champs pls
body:
**DISCLAIMER** THIS IS NOT A FEMINIST QQ POST!

Anyway....I just kinda think there should be some more female champs lately. The last female chap we had is a monster that everyone thinks is a male. Jinx was a very popular champion that came out because of her crazy and cute personality and it would be cool to see more females because seriously....why so many males? Agree?

replies.body: Well, the Male to Female Champion ratio is 83:42, so yeah sure I guess there there could be more females

> [{quoted}](name=ForwardSkies,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hWGEI9TE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-16T13:34:48.024+0000)
>
> New lolhentai. net content pls

rek sai is there, pls fanbase why?
Ahh you want more porn, k
Ummm i am a girl xD

> [{quoted}](name=Too much rage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hWGEI9TE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-17T07:54:48.206+0000)
>
> Ummm i am a girl xD

Hates lesbians.
as long as they have big tits and short skirts
Ah, and they will be named Kaitlyn!

Was searching for ARAM game while reading this.
Literally every person on my team randomed a female.
I think your argument is invalid, there are a large amount of females already in the game, and more are surely being made.
Besides, it's kind of racist to ignore  Rek'Sai because she is not humanoid.
